SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Table Turnover Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Table Turnover Rate is Customer Retention Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Net Promoter Score (NPS)?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Table Turnover Rate is Net Promoter Score (NPS).

SRP.Q: On the Customer Retention Rate, is the point for Dalton, Hunter and Lewis Restaurant inside or outside the point for Smith, Trujillo and Smith Restaurant?
SRP.A: On the Customer Retention Rate, the point for Dalton, Hunter and Lewis Restaurant is inside the point for Smith, Trujillo and Smith Restaurant.

VPR.Q: On dimension Customer Satisfaction Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Customer Satisfaction Rate, label {Dalton, Hunter and Lewis Restaurant} scores the lowest.
